trans-unit.source: Specifies a property that is offered by an extender provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定所提供的扩展程序提供的属性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute is injected automatically by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class on properties that are exposed as extended properties.
trans-unit.target: 自动插入 ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类上公开为扩展属性的属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not use this attribute on your properties.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不要使用你的属性上的此属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProvidePropertyAttribute> on a type that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProvidePropertyAttribute>上实现的类型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ProvidePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extender Providers](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展程序提供程序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要与此实例或 null 引用进行比较 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 等于类型和值的此实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that is being provided.
trans-unit.target: 获取所提供的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> encapsulating the property that is being provided.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>封装所提供的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indication whether the value of this instance is the default value for the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 提供指示此实例的值是否为派生的类的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance is the default attribute for the class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此实例是类; 的默认属性否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the extender provider that is providing the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在提供属性的扩展程序提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider"></xref> that is providing the property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider"> </xref>提供属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of object that can receive the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取可接收属性的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> describing the type of object that can receive the property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>描述可接收属性的对象的类型。</xref:System.Type>
